We will favor accepting weaker new inmates.
The more timid new blood will be easier to control.

\}今のうちに優しくしておけば、後が楽ですよ。

We will only accept weak inmates to join the prison.
At least until we get the prison back under control.

</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}要塞全域を統治するにはまだ長い道のりです。
\}少なくともそれまでは、弱い囚人だけを監獄に迎え入れましょう。
\}\C[11]\I[376]統制力+2【毎日】　\I[406]暴動発生率↓↓　\C[10]\I[411]収入-25％　\I[371]支援金-40％

name: Admittance Policy: Favor Strong
note:
<REM DESC EN>
We will start favoring stronger inmates to accept into the prison.
\}They might be harder to control but the empire will send us more aid, plus strong inmates are better workers.
\C[11]\I[370]Max Subsidies +150 \I[410]Income +5% \C[10]\I[377]Control -2  \I[491]Rare Enemy Chance++
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}囚人は、腕っぷしの強い者を中心に受け入れてみてはどうでしょう？
\}彼らの扱いは難しいですが、将来的に高い労働力になるので帝国も援助を上げてくれますよ。
\}\C[11]\I[370]最大支援金+150　\I[410]収入+5％　\C[10]\I[377]統制力-2【毎日】　\I[491]レア敵エンカウント率↑↑

<REM NAME JP>
収容ポリシー：豪傑は優遇

All new recruits will be trained for a month,
and all guards will have to undergo mandatory 3-day training every month.

\}スタッフには１ヶ月間、警備兵には月に３日のトレーニングを強制するのがよろしいかと。

name: Tough Performance Requirements
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}\}Guards who don't meet certain requirements in their quarterly performance reviews must pay a portion of their salary back.
\}\}And naturally of course, these requirements will be set up in such a way that even the good guards will have trouble meeting them.
\C[11]\I[400]Expense -150 \C[10]\I[413]Guard aggression++ \C[31]\I[10]Corruption +4
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}四半期ごとの業績で、一定条件をクリアしなかった警備兵からは給料の一部を没収しましょう。
\}当然ながら、それは優秀な兵ですらクリア出来ないような条件ですがね……。
\}\C[11]\I[400]経費-150　\C[10]\I[413]警備兵の大胆さ↑↑　\C[31]\I[10]堕落+4
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>

</REM NAME JP>

cost sp: 1

</Set Sts Data>
<Edict Expense: -150>

name: The Rioting Issue
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}\}We've been depending on you, Chief Warden, to not only subjugate Fort Ganon but then to also regain control 
\}\}when riots break out in areas you've cleared. At the current rate, you won't be able to focus on subjugating 
\}\}the rest of Fort Ganon. It is time to deal with this issue now that we have more resources.
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}制圧後のエリアで暴動が発生した時も、我々は長官のお力に頼り切りでした。
\}こんな状態で他のエリアの制圧に集中するのは、もはや至難の業……。
\}潤沢な資金がある今だからこそ、この問題に敢然と立ち向かって参りましょう！
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>
暴動の問題
</REM NAME JP>
<Set Sts Data>
skill: 605,606,607
cost sp: 0
cost gold: 0
required: false
</Set Sts Data>

name: Riot Suppression Training for Guards
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}Our well-armed and trained guards are now ready to receive suppression training 
\}that will give them the skills to swiftly suppress any riots that happens while you are asleep.
\}\}\C[11]\I[406]Riots will not happen unless bankrupted \C[10]\I[401]Expense per Subjugated Level +250 \C[10]\I[405]Guard stats++ \C[10]\I[413]Guard aggression++
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}特殊訓練を受けた警備兵を武装強化し、
\}あなたが眠っている間も暴動を食い止めさせます。
\}\}\C[11]\I[406]破産しない限り暴動は発生しなくなる　\C[10]\I[401]制圧したレベルごとに経費+250　\C[10]\I[405]警備兵の能力↑↑　\C[10]\I[413]警備兵の大胆さ↑↑
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>
警備兵の対暴動・特殊訓練
</REM NAME JP>

Haven't picked a solution to The Rioting Issue
</REM MESSAGE3 EN>
<REM MESSAGE3 JP>
『暴動の問題』の解決策が未実行

name: Harsher Punishments for Rioters
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}\}We have provided so much entertainments and comforts to inmates that they have begun to take them for granted. 
\}\}We can use this to our advantage by taking away those privileges for a certain period of time to anyone who dares to riot against us. 
\}\}\C[11]\I[406]Minimum days before riots can occur in the same Level +2 \C[11]\I[408]Gain more order subduing rioters \C[10]\I[391]Rioter stats++ \C[31]\I[10]Corruption +2
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
\}囚人達にはたっぷりと娯楽や環境を与えて甘やかしてきました。
\}これをあえて利用し、暴徒と化した者には一定期間その権利全てを奪ってやりましょう。
\}\C[11]\I[406]同レベル内での暴動が更に２日以上延長　\I[408]暴徒鎮圧で秩序ボーナス　\C[10]\I[391]暴徒ステータス↑↑　\C[31]\I[10]堕落+2
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>

\}\}This could be a double edged sword though if we are doing anything that pisses them off.
\}\C[11]\I[406]\I[407]Riot chance effects from enacted Edicts are doubled \I[406]Riot chance- \C[10]\I[371]Subsidies -30% \C[31]\I[10]Corruption +3

name: Baked Alaska Insurance
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}\}Baked Alaska Insurance (BAI) is an insurance company willing to work with high risk clients such as ourselves.
\}\}Their company motto is "Scorched on the outside, beautiful on the inside."
\}\}BAI specializes in providing speedy recovery and repairs no questions asked.
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
わゆ損保は、監獄の破損・事故をサポートしてくれる保険会社です。
迅速かつ丁寧な復旧に特化しています。
経営理念は「心にひびく保険を、心にとどくサービスで」だそうです。
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>
わゆ損害保険会社
</REM NAME JP>
<Set Sts Data>
skill: 1869
cost sp: 0
cost gold: 0
</Set Sts Data>

name: BAI Insurance Policy
note:
<REM DESC EN>
\}\}BAI provides insurance to individual areas of the prison with each contract.
\}\}The edict cost of the contract is based on how recent the last riot has occurred in the prison. The cancel cost is unaffected by the state of the prison.
\}\}As long as the prison is not bankrupted, BAI will repair all covered areas after the riot on the Level is over.
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
わゆ損保とは、エリアごとに個別の契約が出来ます。
破産しない限りは各レベルの暴動鎮圧後、全エリアを修復してもらえます。
\}\I[409]指令コスト：最後に暴動が発生した期間によって変動　\I[139]解約料：監獄の状態に関係なく一律
</REM DESC JP>
<REM NAME JP>
わゆ損保について
</REM NAME JP>
<Set Sts Data>
skill: 1878
cost sp: 0
cost gold: 0
</Set Sts Data>

name: Research: Upgrade Prison Locks
note:
<REM DESC EN>
The current locks around the prison are old or broken.
Replacing them with new locks will make it easier to keep the inmates under control.
\C[11]\I[376]Control +2 \I[406]Riot chance- \I[420]Guard Station Invasion chance- \C[10]\I[401]Expense +100
</REM DESC EN>
<REM DESC JP>
